title: Macbook A2141 PPBUS_G3H Shorted
message:
Hello,
Macbook A2141 not getting on.

Found PPBUS_G3H shorted. Removed the Fuses F7000/1. 

Diode Mode Readings (red to ground)
PPVBAT_G3H_CHGR_REG is.488
PPBUS_G3H is .013.

Started checking SSD Coils.
L9080 is 0.351
L9580 is 0.005

title: Macbook A2141 PPBUS_G3H Shorted
message:
Bad news if NAND chips have been damaged.
We have many threads on the forum about SSD problems on A2141.

Remove U9580 and check again diode mode at PPBUS_G3H.
If short disappeared, check aat L9580 too.
If still low there, at least one NAND is fried.

title: Macbook A2141 PPBUS_G3H Shorted
message:
Removed U9580. PPBUS_Short is Gone.
But L9580 is still low.

title: Macbook A2141 PPBUS_G3H Shorted
message: Then you have to deal with SSD failure now.

title: Macbook A2141 PPBUS_G3H Shorted
message:
Have another case.

Removed U9580.

PPBUS_Short .
Diode Mode Reading of L9580 was 0.003. After Removal of U9580 is 0.033.

C9580 is a blank point or is it missing on my board?

Also can this be repaired?

title: Macbook A2141 PPBUS_G3H Shorted
message:
0.033 is still too low for NAND power rail.
At least one chip is bad...

title: Macbook A2141 PPBUS_G3H Shorted
message: Customer is willing to repair it at any cost - how can we proceed?

title: Macbook A2141 PPBUS_G3H Shorted
message:
Search "A2141 SSD repair" on YouTube.
No idea what happened, but the forum doesn't accept to post an URL since 4-5 days...

What is actual SSD size of your machine?

title: Macbook A2141 PPBUS_G3H Shorted
message: I have a JC P13 Programmer. Can you guide me to the right Youtube Channel ?

title: Macbook A2141 PPBUS_G3H Shorted
message:
Check the first video in the search result.
As I already said, I can't post an URL...
